modName: WIP - Ultimate Vampire Mod - Better Vampires - WIP
summary: Changes the Vampire to make it more appealing to play as. Removed the \"4 Stages\" and turned it into a \"2 Stage\" Process. First stage is the strongest stage and the second being the \"weakest\".
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][u][color=#33FF00]Ultimate Vampire Mod ~ Better Vampires![/color][/u][/b][/size]

[color=red][b][OUTDATED / NO LONGER WORKING ON THIS!][/b][/color]
[color=red][b][Checkout Brehanins Vampire Mod!][/b][/color]








This mod was created to make the Vampires a better \"race\" to play as within the game.
I wanted to be a vampire where Feeding makes you stronger not weaker! Skyrims vision of vampires
is very odd as they grow stronger when they don\'t feed but then become \"hated\" - This is not a Vampire in my vision!

Vampires are powerful undead creatures which get weaker as they hunger for blood but are strong, fast immortal creatures when they have fed recently.

[color=red][b][CURRENTLY BUGGED][/b][/color]

[color=purple][b][FEATURES][/b][/color]
There are Two stages of Vampireism, The first stage is the Strong stage where the vampire is at it\'s strongest but they are not hated by NPCs.  They do not get effected by the Sun and still have the ability to Regenerate their stamina, magicka and Health during daylight.

[b]FIRST STAGE[/b]
[u]Strong Stage[/u]
[list]
[*]100% Frost Resistance
[*]15% Weakness to Fire
[*]+20 Extra Unarmed Damage
[*]Health Increased by 10
[*]Magicka Increased by 15
[*]Stamina Increased by 10
[*]The \"Daytime Debuffs\" are Removed. (Such as unable to regen Magicka, Health, Stamina etc) 
[*]SPELLS: (Vampiric Drain, Vampires Seduction, Vampires Servant, Embrace the Shadows, Vampires Sight[TOGGLEABLE])
[*]Waterbreathing
[/list]

[b]SECOND STAGE[/b]
[u]Weak Stage[/u]
[list]
[*]10% Frost Resistance
[*]70% Weakness to Fire 
[*]+5 Unarmed Damage 
[*]NO Buffs to Health, Stamina, Magicka 
[*]\"Daytime Debuffs\" Re-enabled (Unable to Regen Health, Magicka, Stamina, Etc.. In Daylight [05:00 - 17:00 Game Time] 
[*]Vampires Charm Spell Removed, All other spells Weakend. 
[*]Waterbreathing
[/list]

[color=red][b]INFORMATION[/b][/color]
It takes 3 In-Game Days without Feeding on blood to become a Stage 2 Vampire which is drasticly weakend from it\'s first form. 

[b][u][color=green]INSTALLATION[/color][/u][/b]
Download the compressed WinRAR Archive and Extract it to any Location, Then take the UltVamMod.[b]ESP[/b] and place it in your [u]SKYRIM/DATA[/u] Directory.

You will [b]also[/b] have a Scripts folder which needs to be placed in the same folder as the ESP file.
[b]Overwrite any Existing files [u]BUT[/u] keep a backup of the files the mod replaces.[/b]


- Please leave your feedback in the comments section! Also, If you find a bug then feel free to leave a comment about it and I\'ll fix it ASAP. - Also leave any sugestions in the comments also.

Thank you! I hope you Enjoy.

[/center]
author: BevanZ

files.name: V1-1 UltVampMod
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a Small bug with the vampire still being attacked in rare situations.
Added more Vampire spells to Stage 1 Vampires. (Vampiric Drain, Vampires Seduction, Vampires Servant, Embrace the Shadows, Vampires Sight[TOGGLEABLE])
Stage 1 Vampires have Increased Health(10), Increased Magicka(15), Increased Stamina(10)

files.name: V1-5 UltVampMod
files.changelogHtml:
Added Waterbreathing Ability
Fixed the Custom Abilities / Spells not showing up.
Fixed small bugs.
Corrected some spell abilities.
